text: Aru etu sandook laga uporte, mohima thaka Cherubim9.5 Sabole manu nisina (kitia ba janwar nisina) jun khan laga pankh pora Vachan laga Sandook ke din-rati rukhi thake. laga chaya pora sapha kori diya dhakna ke bondh kori kene thakise, kintu etiya etu kotha koi dibole homoi huwa nai9.5 Exo. 25: 18-22..
